name: Bwizard
description:
Bwizard is an over the top fantasy FPS inspired by Doom, Amid Evil and Risk of Rain 2. Take control of Tabus Fiddlewood on his quest for power. 

Stumbling across a powerful entity, Tabus is tasked with defeating his guardians before taking on this fearsome and mysterious entity itself. Utilise the artefacts found throughout this perilous journey and defeat your foes before the blizzard claims you..
